goals.title: Paper-Live Runner (Fixture-Proven) + Live Market-Data Mode (No Real Trading)
goals.objective: Create a "paper-live" runner that consumes market data (fixtures in proofs; real WS/Gamma in live mode) and runs the full mm-core quoting + order-manager loop against a non-networked executor (SimExchange), producing stable observability artifacts without ever touching Polymarket trading endpoints.
constraints: Proof suites must remain offline by default (unit/replay/sim/soak).
Paper-live must never place/cancel orders on Polymarket; it may only use market-data endpoints (Gamma + market WebSocket).
No secrets in repo; security scan must pass.
Do not weaken executor guardrails or geoblock gating.
deliverables: Add scripts/run-paper-live.mjs supporting: --mode fixture|live and writing a stable JSON status/result to --out.

In fixture mode, drive market updates from tests/replay/fixtures/polymarket-market-channel.jsonl and run a bounded mm-core loop using SimExchange+Executor as a deterministic user-event source (no fills).
In live mode (not run in offline proofs), connect to the Polymarket market WebSocket and feed parsed market events into the paper-live engine; never call trading endpoints.
Add tests/sim/paperLiveCli.test.mjs that runs the CLI in fixture mode and writes artifacts/proofs/latest/suite/sim/paper-live-cli.json.

goals.title: Operator Bundle v0 (Mac .command Wrappers + Self-Check, Fixture-Proven)
goals.objective: Add an operator-focused "bundle" (shell/.command scripts) that a non-technical Mac operator can run to: self-check prerequisites, start paper-live, and print status. Prove the bundle works offline by executing it in fixture mode under the sim suite.
constraints: Must not require the operator to know Node/Git beyond double-clicking a script.
Must never embed secrets in the repo or logs.
Must never place/cancel real orders (paper-live only for v0).
Must be safe-by-default: if any precondition fails, refuse to run and write a clear reason.
deliverables: Add operator/selfcheck.command that validates: Node version, repo present, and prints a single JSON status file (no secrets).

Add operator/start-paper.command that runs scripts/run-paper-live.mjs (fixture mode when PROVE_NO_NETWORK=1; live mode otherwise) and writes/updates artifacts/shadow-live or artifacts/paper-live status JSON.
Add operator/status.command that prints a short health summary by reading the latest status JSON and exits 0/1 based on health.
Add tests/sim/operatorBundle.test.mjs that runs selfcheck + start-paper in fixture mode and writes artifacts/proofs/latest/suite/sim/operator-bundle.json.

goals.title: Integration Suite Scaffold (Opt-In Network Tests, Always Writes Artifact)
goals.objective: Add an opt-in integration test suite to the proof harness for networked checks (geoblock endpoint, WS connectivity, etc.) that is never run by default, and which always writes a stable artifact explaining whether it was enabled and what was checked.
constraints: Integration suite must not run by default under `npm run prove`.
Integration tests must do zero network work unless an explicit env flag is set (e.g. INTEGRATION_ENABLED=1).
When not enabled, integration tests must still pass and must still write a small artifact describing what would have run.
deliverables: Update scripts/prove.mjs to support running a new suite: integration (network-enabled by default; not included in default suites).
Add package.json script: integration (runs only that suite).

Add tests/integration/integrationHarness.test.mjs that always writes artifacts/proofs/latest/suite/integration/integration-harness.json with { enabled: boolean, checks: [...] } and only performs network checks when enabled.
Update scripts/list-goals.mjs to include goalpack-v8.json in the default pack list.
